--- Part 1 ---

```{r}
as.numeric(input) |> magrittr::divide_by(3) |> floor() |> magrittr::subtract(2) |> sum()
```

--- Part 2 ---

```{r}
recursive_fuel <- function(i){
  total <- 0
  while(i > 0){
    f <- floor(i/3)-2
    if(f <= 0) f <- 0
    total <- total + f
    i <- f
  }
  total
}
map_dbl(as.numeric(input), recursive_fuel) |> sum()
```
